sen.j: 三中老(さんちゅうろう)は豊臣政権末期に制定された役職で、政事に参与し、五大老と五奉行との意見が合わないときの仲裁役であった。
sen.e: Sanchuro were posts established in the last days of the Toyotomi Administration to participate in political affairs and act as mediators between Gotairo and Gobugyo in case of their conflict.

Sanshuro, which literally means three high-ranking officials called Churo, were the posts established in the last days of the Toyotomi Administration, allowing those three men in the posts to participate in politics, and to mediate between Gotairo and Gobugyo when they cannot agree.
sen.cmt: 下の方で三中老を個別の三人としてtheyで受ける場合もあるので、which literally means three high-ranking officials called Churoを追加。

sen.j: 生駒親正、堀尾吉晴、中村一氏の3名が任命された。
sen.e: Three of Chikamasa IKOMA, Yoshiharu HORIO, and Kazuuji NAKAMURA were appointed.

sen.j: 「太閤記」などの史料にはでてくるが、実際に機能したかは不明で、臨時職あるいは、権威付けのための役職とも言われている。
sen.e: Although 'Sanchuro' appears in some historical sources including 'Taikoki', it is unclear whether they really functioned or not; it is considered that Sanchuro were extraordinary posts or posts to give authority to the three.

Although 'Sanchuro' appears in some historical sources including 'Taikoki', it is unclear whether they really functioned or not; it is considered that they were placed temporarily, or placed as posts to give some authority to the three.
